author: Robin Marx
description:
Conan, his band of Bamula warriors, and Princess Livia have been drugged and imprisoned in the Stygian border town of Keshatta by the ruthless enchantress Athyr-Bast. She and other members of a sorcerous clique known as the Black Ring pit captives against each other in gladiatorial combat as a means of entertaining the unwashed masses […]

The post REVIEW: Conan the Barbarian #22 appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Conan the Barbarian #22
